channel.title: Comments on: Dindy Update

item.title: By: Amit

item.description: Not the same Itai :) But you're right... our Itai is totally an iPhone person :)
item.content:encoded:
Not the same Itai :)
But you’re right… our Itai is totally an iPhone person :)

item.title: By: Alik
item.dc:creator: Alik
item.description: Itai has gotten soft. Once he delved into the ATAM, now he's afraid of Linux. He'll never buy an Android!!! splash
item.content:encoded:
Itai has gotten soft. Once he delved into the ATAM, now he’s afraid of Linux.
He’ll never buy an Android!!! splash

item.title: By: Amit

item.description:
Haha... good one :)
When are you getting your Android-based phone? ;)
item.content:encoded:
Haha… good one :)

When are you getting your Android-based phone? ;)

item.title: By: Itai
